SPECIFICATION OF DATATYPES
-----------------------------------------------
This is used by PLOTA.M

$Id$
Date: 4 Apr 2003
(C) Alois Schloegl <a.schloegl@ieee.org>
Version 1.0 (0.10 for testing)



CONTENT:
=========

TSD_BCI7: summarizes BCI results (online and offline)
    input: FINDCLASSIFIER1, OCO
    output: PLOTA
    
TF_MVAR: result of time-varying multivariate AR analyis	
    input: TFMVAR
    output: PLOTA    
    
HISTOGRAM:	
    input: HISTO, HISTO2, HISTO3 
    output: PLOTA    
    
SCATTER:	
    input: 
    output: PLOTA    
    
REV:	
    input: 
    output: PLOTA    
    
:	
    input: 
    output:
